title: Cho'Gath Golden HP????????
body:
i have cho'gath (just unlocked it)
and i see other peps at youtube/images 
i see their cho'gath has golden hitpoint

https://lolstatic-a.akamaihd.net/champion-abilities/images/0031_05.jpg

is that different with the green hitpoint???

replies.body: This is due to a color blind option which can be toggled via the in-game interface options.  All champion HP bars will be colored this way, so it's not exclusive to Cho'gath.  Let me know if you have any trouble finding it or have any questions!
You can do this by enabling "Colour Blind Mode". This will apply to any champion you play.
